This place was great!  Quick spot to stop for traditional yet modern Tapas.  It was like €1.90 per bite, which sounds cheap but it can get expensive for a full meal, so this is really a better spot for a snack or an extended appetizer. I know its all over Yelp by now but it still felt like a locals' favorite.  Don't stock up completely at the bar since they will be walking around with hot Tapas at times.  There was seating in the back which was empty; there were some bar stools out but we preferred to stand at the wall-mounted bar.
